languages.text: {n}Несколько тысяч беженцев были направлены в епитимальный пилигримаж на поиски реликвий святого Когнация. Многие считали, что это лишь способ избавиться от неудобных людей.{/n}
{n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько тысяч беженцев были направлены в епитимальный пилигримаж на поиски реликвий святого Когнация. Многие считали, что это лишь способ избавиться от неудобных людей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Several thousands of refugees have been sent on the pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of the inconvenient people.{/n}

{n}Several thousands of refugees have been sent on the pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of the inconvenient people.{/n}
{n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}
{n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}
{n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}
{n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几千名难民被派去进行苦修朝圣，寻找圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物。许多人认为，这样的做法不过是为了摆脱这些惹麻烦的家伙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几千名难民被派去进行苦修朝圣，寻找圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物。许多人认为，这样的做法不过是为了摆脱这些惹麻烦的家伙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Varios miles de refugiados han sido enviados en peregrinación de penitencia en busca de las reliquias de san Cognatius. Muchos creían que solo era una forma de deshacerse de estas personas incómodas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Varios miles de refugiados han sido enviados en peregrinación de penitencia en busca de las reliquias de san Cognatius. Muchos creían que solo era una forma de deshacerse de estas personas incómodas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数千人の難民が、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を探そうと、苦行の巡礼の旅に出た。多くの者は、これが不適合者を排除するための手段の一つに過ぎないと考えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数千人の難民が、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を探そうと、苦行の巡礼の旅に出た。多くの者は、これが不適合者を排除するための手段の一つに過ぎないと考えていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs milliers de réfugiés pénitents sont envoyés en pèlerinage à la recherche des reliques de Saint Cognatius. D'aucuns pensent qu'il s'agit en réalité d'un moyen de se débarrasser des gêneurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs milliers de réfugiés pénitents sont envoyés en pèlerinage à la recherche des reliques de Saint Cognatius. D'aucuns pensent qu'il s'agit en réalité d'un moyen de se débarrasser des gêneurs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mehrere Tausend Flüchtlinge wurden auf eine Pilgerreise geschickt, um Buße zu tun, indem sie die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius suchen. Viele waren aber überzeugt, dass das nur eine Methode war, diese unerwünschten Störenfriede loszuwerden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere Tausend Flüchtlinge wurden auf eine Pilgerreise geschickt, um Buße zu tun, indem sie die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius suchen. Viele waren aber überzeugt, dass das nur eine Methode war, diese unerwünschten Störenfriede loszuwerden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Binlerce mülteci, kefaret olarak Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârlarını aramaları için hacı yolculuğuna gönderildi. Niceleri, bu eylemin sürekli güçlük çıkaran bu insanlardan kurtulma yolu olduğu görüşünde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand refugees have been sent on a pilgrimage of penance to search for the relics of Saint Cognatius. Many believed that it was just a way to get rid of these inconvenient people.{/n}
